## QualifierTypes.LiteralValueHierarchy.values property

A map of all allowed literal values to the corresponding [ILiteralValue](./ts-res.qualifiertypes.iliteralvalue.md) validated definition.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly values: ReadonlyMap<T, ILiteralValue<T>>;
```
